__e: I think it's best that everybody forgets everything, don't you?
You forget about having a party at all on Saturday night, or you may not live to see daylight.
- Then why not let me hole up here for a while, till certain people forget what I look like.
Don't forget my bed. Get all the tables. Don't forget the booze.
Thanks very much. Don't forget the party tonight.
And don't forget the big party at the hotel after the show.
Why can't you make them forget it happened?
I bloody my hands... so that everyone else can forget what they are!
Now we must forget, and others must be made to forget what he did.
Why can't you make them forget it happened?
I bloody my hands... so that everyone else can forget what they are!
Now we must forget, and others must be made to forget what he did.
Forget about it and think for yourselves!
So just forget about it, all right?
"A long and happy married life to both, "and don't forget to name the first one after me."
Here, you're in the kitchen. Beyond the door is the restaurant.
Remember that we don't know who's that man with the girl.
And never forget the sobs that arise from this group... as they are sold... and separated forever.
I hope they won't forget us in here.
